wikipedia_page.main: Mary Green (born 10 November 1943) is a British sprinter. She competed in the women's 400 metres at the 1968 Summer Olympics.

response: *Mary Green (journalist), British radio and television presenter
*Dame Mary Green (headteacher) (1913–2004), English head of first comprehensive school in London
*Mary Cozens-Walker married name Mary Green, (1938 – 2020) English textile artist and painter
